description technical detail:
NEC SpectraView 242-BK - 24.1" - LED-backlit LCD Monitor
The NEC SpectraView 242 is a high-end professional performance LCD monitor using latest 10-bit AH-IPS with GB-R LED backlight for color critical applications with many features and benefits for obtaining best picture quality and color accuracy, whilst maintaining attractive value for money.
display type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix
features: Picture in picture, CableComp, AutoBright, picture by picture, TileComp, RapidMotion, Auto Contrast, automatic black level adjustment, TORO Design, 108.6% Adobe RGB color gamut, 99.3% Adobe RGB color gamut
Security lock slot (cable lock sold separately), integrated cable management
interfaces: HDMI ¦ VGA ¦ DisplayPort ¦ DVI-D (dual link) ¦ 2 x USB upstream ¦ 3 x USB downstream
service support details: Limited warranty - 5 years ¦ Limited warranty - backlight - 6 months
